member.name: T:ReflectionTesting.LateBindingTests
member.remarks: Note that the target assembly must be in the same folder as the unit test - for LateBinding tests both project are built into the LateBnding project folder

member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:ReflectionTesting.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
